front.title: Use of the SHAKE One-way Hash Functions in the Cryptographic Message Syntax (CMS)

abstract.t: This document updates the "Cryptographic Message Syntax Algorithms" (RFC3370) and describes the conventions for using the SHAKE family of hash functions in the Cryptographic Message Syntax as one-way hash functions with the RSA Probabilistic signature and ECDSA signature algorithms. The conventions for the associated signer public keys in CMS are also described.
